snippet.title: Elroy Hits The Pavement (1996, Headbone Interactive, PC)
snippet.description:
I've been going through some of my old PC games that where stored away in the basement, and I found this game. It was one of my favorite games when I was a kid.

This game is an adventure game for the PC, released in 1996, the game is about 2 kids named Elroy and Sid doing a science project that was due in one day, if failed they have to go to summer school. They build an invention called the Canine Revitalizer, but it got stolen later on in the game, and Elroy and Sid would start doing some detective work of who stole the Canine Revitalizer.

This is a game that just disapeared into obscurity, can't find a Wikipedia entry, No MobyGames entry, not a single info in this game, all I found is this preview of this game.

Now, Lets see I can run this thing on my Mac useing VMWare.
